item.description:
We have been invited by Star Touring to participate with them on a Duck Tour in Boston.  This will be a nonriding day as we could take the T or carpool into Boston.  (Steve is our guest speaker at our next meeting).

 

Please RSVP ASAP so I can give him a count.  Please understand that once you say yes, you have commited to the tickets.  I would like to give him a count by early next week.

 

Below is his invitation.  Your committment will be your rsvp to this meetup. 

 

Meetup details to get into Boston to follow.

 

Chapter 225 of STAR Touring and Riding invites you to join us on a Duck Tour of Boston.

We have reserved an entire Duck for Saturday, July 21 at 11:00am leaving from the Prudential Center in Boston.

 

We need to fill the boat, 36 people, to keep the cost at $30 per person.

I selected the time and place because that will give many of you a chance to shop and eat after the ride.

The Prudential Center has a huge parking garage so if you plan to bike it or cage it in town, you will have a place to park.

 

This invite is open to you, your friends and your family to bring as many people that you can.

If we have to get a second Duck we can do that too.

 

I need to know as soon as possible if you want to go and how many people you will be bringing.

Your verbal/email response will be your commitment and you will be responsible for the seat.

If you need to cancel, your money will be refunded only if we are able to fill your seat(s) with other riders.

 

Please get back to me as soon as possible with your intent and the number of people in your party.

 

Ride Safe and let?s have fun.

Steve Johnson

VP/Treasurer, Chapter 225.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Just Ducky.......Boston Duck Tour
